Were you ever married to almost starvation level living or any other?
I can not remember any difference in the early day meals those served by my mother up till then which

mother used mostly from home grown prepared food she bought an occasional can of corn or tomatoes she always had a wonderful garden with vegetables & flowers also small fruit such as currants & gooseberries.

Before coming to Canada I understand my father and a neighbor walked considerable distance to town & came home carrying 100 lbs of flour & of flour.
I can not remember any difference in the early day meals to those served by my mother up till ten years.

21. When did you begin to rely on prepared foods instead of home-prepared foods? (Give us dates if possible.)

Mother used mostly from time to time prepared food. She bought an occasional can of corn or tomatoes. She always had a wonderful garden with vegetables & flowers along with small fruit such as cucumbers & tomatoes.

22. Please add other details from your early experience of buying groceries and eating them. (Do not mention about quality, methods of purchasing, prices, places of storage, shortages and other details. Use back of paper if space is needed.)

But for coming to campus I understand my father and a neighbor walked considerable distance to town & came home carrying lunch of from 6 to 8 hours.
